participant_abstract.sent: We explored the design and technological options of the remote control.
We came to some agreements on the conceptual design fairly quickly and did not use the whole time provided.

participant_actions.sent: The designers will come up with a look-and-feel and user interface design.
Our marketer is going to bring a product evalution.
I'm going to try to finish writing up the minutes from meeting 2 and do the minutes for meeting 3.

participant_decisions.sent: Harder plastic casing around control buttons.

participant_problems.sent: Nobody was particularly interested in using the fruit and veggie trend.
